title: Golf Cup
info: The Golf Cup is a block and activation mechanism used in Golf. It can be purchased from the Golfer for 1. When a Golf Ball enters the cup, the golf ball projectile is removed from the world, the cup emits a wire signal, and an announcement (in the chat) will share how many strokes the player took between placing the ball, hitting it and reaching the cup.
stat:
